title: League Client Error - Bad Image, Please Help

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I've been having problems with opening the league client for weeks now. Uninstalled and reinstalled multiple times including fully deleting every file in the 'Riot Games' directory. I still keep getting errors that look like the image that I linked


Any help?

replies.body: This is usually caused by security settings on your OS or anti-virus that's causing the game to not install properly.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.  Once complete, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for a clean reinstall to fix this up!

Try removing the files manually, then reaquiring the downloader from the website and using the reaquired downloader to instal once more - you may have already done this, i persnally havent run into this issue but just some speculation
